overview: Cloe is a six-year-old girl with a great passion: Spiderman! And for the first day of school she could only choose the folder of her favorite character. But why when she shows off her new backpack, does everyone tell her that "it's for boys"? Chloe's journey begins with the discovery that there is a universe for males and another for females.
title: Mi piace Spiderman... e allora?
